args.content:
import Mathlib
open TopologicalSpace Metric Set Filter Asymptotics Function
open scoped Topology Filter NNReal Real

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and f'(p) ‚â† 0 for some p ‚àà U. Then there exist neighborhoods V of p and W of f(p) such that f : V ‚Üí W is a bijection and f^{-1} is holomorphic. -/
theorem exists_bijective_inverse_holomorphic_on_nhds_of_deriv_ne_zero {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U)
    {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U) (p : ‚ÑÇ) (hp : p ‚àà U) (h : deriv f p ‚â† 0) :
    ‚àÉ V ‚àà ùìù p, ‚àÉ W ‚àà ùìù (f p), ‚àÉ g : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ,
      Bijective g ‚àß (‚àÄ z ‚àà V, g z ‚àà W) ‚àß (‚àÄ z ‚àà V, g (f z) = z) ‚àß (‚àÄ z ‚àà W, f (g z) = z) ‚àß
        DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ g U := by sorry
